text: Ivan Udarević (born 18 November 1982 in Osijek) is a Croatian footballer who plays as a defender for Motor Lublin in the Polish Second League. ==Career== Udarević previously played for NK Inter Zaprešić in the Croatian First League. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Croatian footballers Category:Croatian expatriate footballers Category:NK Belišće players Category:NK Inter Zaprešić players Category:APOEL FC players Category:ŁKS Łódź players Category:Polonia Warsaw players Category:Flota Świnoujście players Category:Motor Lublin players Category:Croatian First Football League players Category:Ekstraklasa players Category:Cypriot First Division players Category:Association football defenders Category:Expatriate footballers in Cyprus Category:Sportspeople from Osijek Category:Expatriate footballers in Poland Category:Croatian expatriate sportspeople in Poland
title: Ivan Udarević
